email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

Hope you're doing well.

We have a vessel available for your coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. The vessel, PACIFIC STAR, is workable for this route. Details are as follows:
- Cargo Size: 75000MT
- Incoterm: CIF
- Freight Quote: USD 25 per MT

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Maria Gomez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thank you for the offer. Can you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA? Also, what is the laycan for this shipment?

Best regards,
Alex Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Vessel Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

PACIFIC STAR has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 290m. The laycan is 2023-10-01 to 2023-10-05.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Rate Negotiation
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. We are seeing rates closer to USD 22 per MT from other owners. Can you adjust the rate?

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

We can adjust the freight rate to USD 23 per MT. Additionally, the demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day pro rata.

Please confirm if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

USD 23 per MT and USD 20,000 demurrage rate per day are acceptable. Please proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Booking is confirmed. We will send the final documents shortly.

Best regards,
Maria
